body.name: SONGMICS Dish Drying Rack, Stainless Steel Dish Rack with Rotatable Spout, Drainboard, Fingerprint-Resistant Dish Drainers for Kitchen Counter, 12.5 x 22.5 in, Silver and Gray UKCS030E01
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: [72-Hour Salt Spray Test Passed] This stainless steel dish rack has passed a rigorous 72-hour salt spray test, demonstrating superior rust resistance. Easy to clean and incredibly durable, it's designed to provide long-lasting service

[Quality Stainless Steel] Built to withstand years of frequent use, this dish rack is made with brushed stainless steel which is rustproof, resistant to oils and fingerprints, and easy to clean with a simple wipe
[Adjustable Spout] The 360° rotatable and extendable drain spout under the drainboard can be set in 4 directions to fit your counter space and channel the water directly to sink from any side

[Versatile Storage] Able to hold 9 plates upright and several bowls, this dish drainer also has a cup holder for 4 cups and a cutting board, and a 3-department utensil holder for sorting forks, spoons, and knives

[Removable and Customizable] The cup holder comes with a removable drip tray that collects the water for easy cleaning; along with the utensil holder, they can both be repositioned to any side of the drying rack
[What You Get] A dish drying rack for kitchen counter sized at 12.5”D x 22.5”W x 9.7”H with a modern, low-profile design that matches any kitchen style.

productInformation.value: Easy Draining, Quality Stainless Steel, 360° Rotatable Spout, Removable and Customizable, Versatile Storage See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 360° Rotatable Spout The drain spout can be set in four directions so the dishwater will drain into the sink from any side without leaving a puddle on your counter. 1” Plate Slot Spacing The plate slots with a 1” spacing are designed to hold either large plates or small plates. Cup Holder The cup holder can hold four small cups and also includes a slot for a cutting board. The drip tray underneath the cup holder catches water drips. Utensil Holder The utensil holder has three compartments that help organize forks, spoons, and knives. It also comes with a rod to hold a dishcloth.

Quality Performance: The stainless steel frame is rustproof while the brush surface is resistant to oils and fingerprints so you can keep this dish rack clean with minimal maintenance. The PP plastic drainboard with a special coating spreads the water out to dry more efficiently. Rotatable Spout: The 360-degree rotatable spout underneath the drainboard allows you to set it on the longer or shorter side of the drying rack so it can drain water into the sink from any side. Specifications: Color: Silver, GrayMaterial: Stainless Steel, PP PlasticProduct Size: 12.5"D x 22.5"W x 9.7"H (31.7 x 57.2 x 24.6 cm)Product Weight: 4 lb (1.8 kg) Package Contents: 1 x Dish Rack1 x Accessory Kit1 x Instructions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very functional, useful and attractive kitchen appliance.
reviews.reviewText: This Songmics Dish Drying Rack was a breeze to set up. It affords ample space for cups, glasses, saucers, plates, bowls and pots and pans. Of course, there is a compartmentalized cutlery holder, and a rotatable drainage spout, a very nice and functional feature, indeed. It is made of stainless steel and durable rubber. It's well worth the rather affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much nicer than other dish drainers.
reviews.reviewText: This looks very nice due to the brushed metal trim. It also holds quite a lot of dishes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice rack. The only part I don't use is the cup holder part. It's too narrow for coffee cups or any cup. I mean, I can put cups there but they end up dripping dry onto the countertop or floor and not the tray it has under it since it's too narrow.The only other con I have is, how to clean under the drip tray. I can't figure out if that comes off without feeling like I'm going to break it.Overall, it's great, I love that silverware holder, it drips perfectly into the main part and holds plenty.If I can't figure out how to clean under the main drip tray, then I might have to get a different one next time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really well designed!
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly on my counter top and drains water into the sink without getting all over the counter. Very happy with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for product
reviews.reviewText: The drain part is great and we love that the water spout can be turned to use it on different sides. The material is sturdy and well built.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars can hold a large pizza pan vertically
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice looking drainer with lots of options. You can move the two side drainers to another side and direct the bottom drain spout as needed. I chose this because I can put my 16" pizza pan, or a large cutting board, vertically on the side drainer. The flatware drainer is a bit small but I only use it for cutting utensils (steel knives & peelers) that shouldn't go in the dishwasher. We are very happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent, but you get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: This rack looks nice, fits well in our kitchen, and seems fairly sturdy. However, there are some design flaws that need to be worked around to make this functional. The cup rack causes glasses to be angled away from the tray, so they drain onto the counter. The plastic tray under the cup rack doesn’t fit well into the metal frame. This is a cosmetic problem, not a functional one. Lastly, the silverware rack tips away from the base, so water can’t drain out. I fixed this by putting a paper clip against the back of the rack on the base, but of course, I shouldn’t have to be modifying a new rack to make it work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great looking, easy set up. Nice modern look. The hardest part was the un-boxing. This item was packed, so there would be no damage from shipping. Great product.
this dish rack is amazing and lots of space for dishes. steel looks perfect and perfect for every space

reviews.reviewerName: Muy bonito tal como la imagen y de buen tamaño
reviews.reviewText: Muy bonito hace juego con mi cocinaexcelente producto

Vi algunas reseñas que se quejan del tamaño del producto, pero la verdad es que viendo las especificaciones y fotos es claro que es un escurridor pequeño, así que sólo puedo decir que es una excelente opción para cocinas reducidas o cuando tienes poco espacio para poner un escurridor. Buenos materiales, bonito diseño. La salida de agua debajo del escurridor se me hace una gran idea, funciona muy bien. Lo recomiendo.
Overall a good product. BUT, glass rack only accept small size glasses. Bigger ones will drip outside the rack
Todo bien lo único que realmente no me gustó es para detener los vasos ya que si son de vidrio son fácil de que se puedan caer en lo demás todo perfecto.😃
